sense.def:
To escape from something or someone
pomeni uspešno se izogniti nekomu ali nečemu.

seg.quote: Ralph was thankful to have escaped responsibility.
The two other burglars were tipped off by a lookout and escaped.

sense.def:
To escape from a place
pomeni uspešno oditi z nekega kraja.

seg.quote: On 7 October Eva escaped from prison.
He had shot and killed two escaped convicts.

sense.def:
An escape
je pobeg z določenega kraja ali iz določenih okoliščin.

seg.quote: They were now able to make their escape.

sense.def:
Z besedo
escape
lahko povemo, da smo nekaj srečno preživeli, na primer nesrečo.

seg.quote: The minister escaped without a scratch.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
escapes someone
ali
escapes one's attention
, za tisto ne vemo ali se tistega ne spominjamo.

seg.quote: I doubt that such tactics escaped their notice.

sense.def:
An escape
je način izogibanja težavam ali odgovornostim.

seg.quote: Reading is an escape from reality.

sense.def:
Kadar plin ali tekočina
escapes
, pušča iz pipe ali posode.
